resortComponent.title: Resort
resortComponent.text: Shekvetili resort is located in the Kvemo Kartli region, surrounded by majestic mountains, allowing you to enjoy stunning landscapes. The climate here is mild and temperate, with warm summers and mild winters. Thanks to this, the resort of Shekvetili is an attractive place to relax at any time of the year.

card1.title: Park Tsitsinatela
card1.description: A unique amusement park with a wide range of attractions.

card2.title: BlackSea Arena
card2.description: Concert venue for music concerts and festivals.

card3.title: Arboretum
card3.description: Incredible park with giant trees and a mini zoo.

card5.title: Botanical Garden
card5.description: Huge area with great flora. Paradise for eyes and soul.

hotelComponent.title: Hotel
hotelComponent.text: The four-star Olimp Hotel in Shekvetili is located in the heart of the Shekvetili resort. Olimp Hotel offers easy access to all major attractions and the beach.

roomsComponent.title: Rooms
roomsComponent.text: All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a refrigerator, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath.
